channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov hits ‘misguided approach’ of French charges against him in first public comments
item.description: In a Telegram post late Thursday, Durov defended himself against the French judicial investigation, suggesting that he shouldn't have been targeted pe...

item.title: Telegram CEO says French charges against him are 'misguided' — read his full statement
item.description: The boss of controversial messaging platform Telegram said late Thursday that charges against him by France are "misguided."

item.title: CEO Jensen Huang has sold more than $633 million in Nvidia stock since June
As singles ditch dating apps, the Spanish are finding love in supermarket aisles—with some help from pineapples
item.description: Dating apps are getting boring and tedious. The Spanish are turning instead to supermarkets in the hopes of finding romance.

item.title: Friday's analyst calls: Broadcom earnings reaction, Chinese EV stock gets an upgrade
item.description: A chipmaker and a Chinese electric vehicle maker were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Friday.

item.title: Exclusive: Fed’s Goolsbee says data justifies multiple rate cuts, starting soon
Harris campaign raised $361 million in August—more than double Trump haul
item.description: The massive Harris war chest is being used to fund a $370 million paid media effort for the final two months of the campaign.

item.title: British competition regulator objects to Google's ad tech practices
item.description: Britain's competition watchdog provisionally found that Google's ad tech practices are impacting competition in the U.K.

item.title: Florida couple with GameStop winnings continues to build stake in JetBlue
Treasury says IRS push has recovered $1.3 billion in unpaid taxes from wealthy since late 2023
item.description: Between 2010 and 2018, the audit rate for millionaires fell by 80%, according to Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen.

item.title: 88 corporate leaders endorse Harris in new letter, including CEOs of Yelp, Box
item.description: The letter is meant as a political show of force for Kamala Harris in a tight race with Donald Trump. The first presidential debate is less than a wee...

item.title: Markets are uneasy as a U.S. recession looks more likely
Real estate developer convicted alongside New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez pleads guilty to bank fraud
item.description: Fred Daibes, 67, entered the plea in U.S. District Court in Newark, the U.S. Attorney's office said in a statement.

item.title: Millionaires are moving to these 5 European cities — and London doesn't make the list
item.description: A new report finds that 83% of millionaires looking to relocate are eyeing city living, but London is no longer a top destination.

item.title: Nvidia investors don’t need to worry — unless the stock falls below these prices
